What are the treatments for Agnosia ?,Treatment is generally symptomatic and supportive. The primary cause of the disorder should be determined in order to treat other problems that may contribute to or result in agnosia.,NINDS,Agnosia
What is the outlook for Agnosia ?,Agnosia can compromise quality of life.,NINDS,Agnosia
